title: An exhortation to the diligent studye of scripture, made by Erasmus Roterodamus. And tra[n]slated in to inglissh. An exposition in to the seventh chaptre of the first pistle to the Corinthians
author: Erasmus, Desiderius, d. 1536.
publisher: In the londe of Hesse. M.D.xxix. xx daye Iunij. By my Hans Luft [i.e. J. Hoochstraten],
